page.title: 02WORK IN ALTAMUSKIN
page.content: {In our survey we've found that almost {the full population is employed. It's a{farming community}mainly,some part-time,some full-time with just a few farms giving a full-time job to more than 1 person.A farmer with a suckling herd usually has a part-time job in the area. Many have local{jobs connected with {the building trade,}as small contractors or subcontracting their own trade as builder,carpenter,cabinet maker,electrician,etc. { Three local sand and gravel quarries give further employment- business management,operating machinery, plant maintenance, lorry driving,etc. Others,especially women, find work in the nearby towns,in{Omagh's 2 {hospitals, the abbatoir and Desmond's {shirt factory.}The number of skilled workmen in the area is pretty high.
